tool_description: Access the official Aruba government company register. Ideal for KYB purposes
name: Aruba Company Data
title: Aruba Company Data

api_list.name: GetCompanybyID
api_list.description: Search the Aruba business register by company ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aruba-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/bedrijf/public/HANDELSREGISTER/54780/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aruba-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aruba-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/bedrijf/public/HANDELSREGISTER/{id}/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aruba-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search the Aruba company register by text
